home.description: I'm a passionate developer focused on creating engaging and functional digital experiences. Let's build something amazing together!

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: Hello! I'm Davi Passos. My passion is building bridges between logic and creativity to create digital solutions. With a background in Systems Analysis and starting a degree in Mathematics at UNIFEI, I am fascinated by solving complex problems and turning them into intuitive experiences for people.
about.bio2: Beyond formal projects, my creative playground is game development, where I explore new mechanics and narratives. I also dedicate time to open-source projects and am always searching for the next coding puzzle to solve.
about.philosophy1Desc: At the end of the day, technology is about people. Beautiful code is nice, but code that truly helps is what drives me.
about.philosophy2Desc: I genuinely love the process of unraveling a problem. The search for a solution, the tests, the errors, and finally, that 'a-ha!' moment when everything clicks... that feeling is incredible.
about.philosophy3Desc: I don't have all the answers, and I think that's great. I believe in an environment where asking for help is normal and teaching what you know is a gift. The best solutions are born from exchanging ideas.
about.journey1Desc: I completed high school with an integrated technical education, which gave me a foundation in programming, web design, and hardware (Arduino), sparking my passion for technology.
about.journey2Title: Technician at SENAI & Undergrad at UNIFEI
about.journey2Desc: I graduated as a Systems Analysis and Development Technician from SENAI while starting my Mathematics degree at UNIFEI, combining hands-on practice with a solid theoretical foundation in logic.
about.journey3Desc: I apply and expand my programming skills as a developer in a UNIFEI extension project focused on game creation, working collaboratively to turn ideas into reality.
about.journey4Desc: With a solid technical and academic background, I am prepared and looking for opportunities to work on challenging and innovative projects in the software development market.
